results.title: The 19th Century’s Most Scandalous Painting Comes to New York
results.abstract: “Olympia,” the brothel scene that birthed modern art, crosses the Atlantic for the first time in the Met exhibition “Manet/Degas.”

media.caption: Manet’s 1863 painting “Olympia,” in the collection of the Musée d’Orsay in Paris, will be the focal point of “Manet/Degas,” one of the Metropolitan Museum of Art’s major fall exhibitions.
